channel.title: Abstract levels? :D
channel.description:
some of you guys told me about it with my pacman 2d game. i was wondering how i would go about doing this. or if i couldnt figure it out. maybe i could give one of you guys the source and do it for me :P you would get credit if u wanted
all i would need would be the base on how to do it, i could implement all the levels in myself. what do ya say?
either one works.

item.title: Abstract levels? :D
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

thats fine with me too. i would be fine with rewriting most of the code. adding the source… now

dont make fun of my shitty code TOO much

pacman 2d (from flashdrive).rar - 492 Kb

and the other thread has everything compiled with no java files. if u want to decompile it. or u can take this one.

Read full topic

item.title: Abstract levels? :D
item.dc:creator: @the_bank the bank
item.description:
@the_bank wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:2, topic:360004”]We would have to see the source in order to give you pointers on how to do it. Depending on what the rest of your code looks like you may have to rewrite most of the code, or maybe very little.[/quote]He uploaded the source in the other thread…

Read full topic
